From the moment we opened the door, we were right at home. We felt extremely welcome and very safe at all times. This is a larger home with 3 levels, so it's easy to spread out. We genuinely enjoyed our choice, and accommodations.

Great place to stay in Casper. The views from the kitchen and primary bedroom are beautiful. They have everything you might need without additional clutter.
Scott and Jess’s home was comfortable and clean. The kids loved the air hockey table in the basement and the views were beautiful.

The house has lots of steps so take that into consideration if traveling with older folks. My dad didn’t appreciate it but that is my own fault for not thinking about the steps when booking. I loved the fact that everyone could have their own space and not disturb each other. I would definitely stay there again.
Great for a family! Nice part of town. Will stay again!
Great place to stay! We loved staying here.

Such a beautiful place to stay! I wish we could have stayed longer, but if we’re ever in the area again I will stop in again!
Amazing place to stay!

We had a wonderful stay. It was a darling place in a fairly private location. The kitchen had everything we needed to make our meals. The entire house was so clean. The best part was that we could enjoy FOUR FULL bathrooms while we traveled, which is great when traveling with four kids! They were great hosts. I would absolutely recommend and stay there again.
Great place for stay at. Hosts communicated very well and made sure everything went well. Would stay again.
We really enjoyed our stay! The house was very clean and had the perfect amount of space!

Scott and Jess's place was beautiful and very welcoming. They shared their home with my family to celebrate our sister's retirement from the U.S. Army. The house manual included a ton of local information and had great recommendations. Thanks again Scott and Jess.
Very large beautiful house. We liked the privacy of the area, didn’t have put up with noisy traffic. Overall pleasant experience.
Very nice place! Would absolutely stay again!
Beautiful home, perfect break during our visit.
Beautiful home with a very private and quiet location!
We were visiting my sister for the holidays, this place was great. Family friendly, great location and very spacious! We would definitely stay here again.

Traveled to visit family and this place was perfect, 20 minutes to skiing, 10-15 minutes to hiking in town along the river or up on the mountain, 10-15 minutes to restaurants and ice skating downtown. Quiet location, beautiful home, couldn't ask for more.

Awesome airbnb!! so cozy and the hosts were so friendly and helpful! the whole house was set up for convenience. kitchen was fully stocked! plenty of space in the house. the master bathroom was our favorite part. very thoughtfully set up. throughly enjoyed our stay here.
Great house to have when visiting family in town.

What a lovely home and location. Set right at the end of a neighborhood in the foothills, has a great backyard and kitchen area. Lots of sleeping options and very easy to find. Close drive to restaurants and downtown.
9 of us came to Casper for a volleyball tournament. We loved this house for our stay. It was beautiful and clean. Plenty of space for all of us. We plan to stay here again next year!
Beautiful home and great owners

Great location. Beautiful views. Lots of potential.
Great place, good beds and beautiful location. Saw some antelope 50 yards from the house.

We had 6 family members from 4 different states join up to stay @ this beautiful setting. We felt 100% safe in the home day & night as well as walking about the peaceful quiet neighborhood. We quickly realized we would need more paper products & reported this to the hosts who had the items delivered within just a couple hours. We wish the heat/ac would have functioned more evenly throughout the 3 levels to make us more comfortable & ensure a good rest nightly. We loved being able to be together first thing for coffee in the morning & throughout the entire day to talk nonstop & share meals. Having the use of the garage to park 1 car & the garage opener was an added plus.
We enjoyed our stay!

Truthfully one of the best places I have stayed. The hosts are very responsive and kind. The house is spacious and very accommodating. Games for all ages and beautiful surroundings!
Very accessible. They are very generous in my opinion with everything they offer in the house. Including a lot of kitchen appliances, ice maker, air hockey, garage access, games, multiple streaming services, a binder full of recommendations of things to do and where to eat.
We had a group of 5 adults and one 4 year old. We were up here for an antelope hunt. Everyone had room and felt very comfortable. So many full baths. I could go on and on. Don't miss out on this place. You won't regret it!!
Great people. Wonderful home and very comfortable. My iPhone GPS took us right to the home. Easy to find restaurants. A must do is rotary park. Would definitely stay again.
This place worked out great for our overnight stop. Scott and Jess were great hosts.
Enjoyed a very nice stay. Very clean. Comfortable beds. Peaceful neighborhood.

The house was great. It was spacious, clean and just as pictured. The kids enjoyed the air hockey and it was nice seeing the antelope and horses in the field out back. The garage is nice and big. Definitely would recommend.
Had a wonderful time and very grateful for the beautiful home.
Beautiful house and yard. Great recommendations for places to eat and see.
Gorgeous multilevel home with everything you could need, spotless, and very responsive and friendly hosts. Even though the photos are nice, the actual home is even better. Book this!

Nice house with a gorgeous view! We appreciated the kitchen, laundry, travel crib, and invitation to park in the garage. My only caveat for families of little ones is that this house has a lot of stairs.
This is by far the most nicest air b n b I’ve stayed in. I recommend this house to everybody that’s looking to stay in Casper. Host is very nice and very responsive

Wow!!!! Beautiful home with more amenities than described. Comfortable beds, noise machines and fans made for a great night’s sleep. Incredible guest guide with thorough & helpful recommendations that highlight local businesses, not chains! Maps too!!. I plan to return to spend more than one night and take advantage of some of the recommended activities in the area.

Scott & Jess’s place was as close to home as we’ve found! Their home is beautiful and exactly as listed. We were very comfortable and would definitely stay again if we make it back out this way!
Very kind and clear communication. Lots of extra amenities that made us feel at home.
Great location and nice & quiet! Very clean and well maintained. We sure appreciated such a nice place to stay! Thanks again!

Came to Wyoming for son’s wedding and saw so much more, Antelope and horses right out the back window. Quiet place to lay our heads after long days. Very comfortable with separate areas for the sleeping baby and family laughter.
Super clean and very large and nice home at the end of a street. Large fenced in backyard.
We had a wonderful time! the house was beautiful, well kept and accommodating to our needs.
Great place for families!
Great place. Lots of room for everybody. I appreciate having access to the garage. Kitchen w as well stocked. If you need a place in Casper, this is it.

Beautiful home with plenty of room for my family of six. Scott and Jess were responsive and respectful. The house is in a nice walkable neighborhood. We were very happy with our stay and will not hesitate to stay here again!
Wonderful house! We had a great stay!!
We spent a weekend in Casper and this house was perfect for four of us and could easily handle more. its in a peaceful scenic. Everything we needed was close and I would highly recommend this house.

My family and I drove up from Denver to attend a family wedding. The house was perfect for our multigenerational family.
Very beautiful home, located in a really nice area. Scott and Jess make everything really easy. Probably the best Airbnb in Casper

The home was exactly as described. It was beautiful, clean and large enough to host a family. The master bed was very comfortable and we loved the walk-in shower. The food recommendations were spot on and we appreciate the available coffee options for the morning. The views out back were wonderful. Saw some wild life in the morning! I would absolutely recommend someone to stay!

The house was amazing, peaceful and had an amazing view. When you walk in, the place just feels like home. The open kitchen/dining/living room floor plan was great for just hanging out and relaxing. The house is very furnished and the kitchen is well stocked with essential items for cooking. We utilized the grill out on the back patio and spent time out there enjoying the spectacular view of Casper Mountain.
Scott and Jess were amazing hosts. We received an email several days in advance with the door code and very clear instructions on how to enter the house. Communication was prompt, accurate and friendly. We would highly recommend staying in this house or any other properties hosted by Scott and Jess.
Beautiful house. Lots of space. Well equipped. We enjoyed watching the wildlife in the field behind the house.
This house was an amazing place to stay for our family. Beautiul house and views. We would love to come back again!
House was very nice. Loved the open fields with plenty of room for the kids to roam. Would definitely stay there again.

Great place for our kids soccer tournament this weekend! Cozy, inviting, great place to come back to in between and after games. Kitchen is well stocked. Lots of different areas for kids and parents to hang out.

this home is perfect in every way: if spending any length of time in casper, look no further!! comfy, clean, beautiful, well equipped, air conditioned (!!!), spacious, nothing was missing for a fantastic family stay.

Very clean home, quiet location.
Great Host!

Absolutely fantastic house! Close enough to town that you can get whatever you need (Target/Walmart, food, gas, etc.) without it taking an eon to get there but far enough out that it’s quiet and offers truly majestic views. We enjoyed watching the pronghorn and horses from the backyard during the day and an exquisite view of the Milky Way at night. Large house with plenty of room and great amenities. Definitely enjoy breakfast on the back deck while watching the sunrise or take your coffee in the cool shade of the side porch patio.

10/10 do recommend.

The views and quiet location are worth the cost alone, but the little extras included from games to coffee and everything else just made it that much better. The beds are comfortable and the house is beautiful. Definitely a place i would stay again.

Beautiful home. And very easy people to communicate with.

Sizable, clean home with a great view of the hills and mountains out back. Scott and Jess were also quick to respond to any communications. Their guide made it very easy to prepare and check in to our stay.

This was my first Airbnb stay, and Scott and Jess have set the bar high! The home is large, clean, comfortable, and well-supplied. It was perfect for our family gathering. We enjoyed looking for the antelopes just beyond the backyard and playing board games and air hockey in the evenings. I really liked Casper, Wyoming and would not hesitate to stay there again!

Our stay was very comfortable. Scott and Jess are great hosts, communicate quickly. The Instructions are easy to follow and the home is Very clean. Definitely recommend to anyone traveling or visiting the area.

Scott and Jess's place was amazing. Hands down, the best Airbnb we have stayed at so far. There was tons of room and it was more than enough for us (our other 3 guests canceled last minute). Even if we had a full house there would have been extra space. I loved the organization (info in a binder) and how easy everything was. Thank you so much for letting us stay!

This was a lovely, comfortable, spacious, well equipped home! We had such a great time here... we relaxed along our road trip from California to Indiana. This was the ideal home to hang out and chill. We slept really well. It's so quiet! And we were able to watch movies and chill out on the big sofa... and cook meals in the kitchen... and it was just super fun. Thanks to the hosts!

The house was the last house on the street, that had a view of the lands on one side of the house and backyard view was open and pretty. Saw 2 pronged deer right outside the backyard. Clean house with a manual and suggestions. Would of given 5 stars for everything, but they unfortunately they had some sort of water leak from a storm a couple of night before we got there and water got into their basement. I got a notification that they found a leak and they were getting it cleaned out and it smelled a little musty, a couple hours before we were suppose to check in. They're communication was great. But the basement was still wet when we got there and we really couldn't use the basement living area. The bedroom that was located in the basement was one of the wettest spot, so only was there to sleep, couldn't relax down in the basement living area, cause the fans and windows had to be kept opened to help with the drying. Once we turn off the fan and closed the window to go the bed, the smell was pretty bad. The hosts were great in communicating what was going on and we felt bad that they had a leak, but would of been nice if they had offered a discount or something on the night because of the inconvenience.
Great place! Highly recommend!
Spacious and quiet home! Great place to stay on the edge on town.

This home was wonderful! Exceptionally clean and well appointed. Beautiful views from the TWO deck areas. Would have been perfect for morning coffee or evening happy hour, but, it is springtime in the Rockies and the weather doesn't always play nice! Plenty of room for everyone! Really great kitchen. Beds comfy. Plenty of parking. Really nice, quiet neighborhood. We celebrated Mothers Day and our daughters birthday last weekend and we were on the go constantly. And that is my only regret...we weren't there enough to truly enjoy all this home has to offer!
Great hosts, the house was perfect

We stayed for 2 weeks at Scott and Jess' very comfortable 4 bed/4 bath home conveniently located in central Casper. The home is quite large and very comfortable. It is by far the best appointed AirBNB we have ever stayed in with more than ample supplies, sheets, pillows, blankets, etc. For those that like to cook, it has a very large and well supplied kitchen/fridge. There is a large garage which we were happy to have on snow days. As a nice bonus, the home overlooks a huge natural prairie with a large herd of Pronghorn Antelope and some horses which we observed each day. Bring your binoculars!
Scott and Jess are very attentive hosts. But, the house was so well set up we never needed to bother them.
We will 100% stay here again next time we are in Casper.

The home is beautiful and spacious. We are a family of four and went to Wyoming to visit our daughter, son-in-law, and 1st grand-baby. The house was perfect for all of us to have meals together and visit.
The house is fully equipped with extras. It was nice not having to pack shampoo, conditioner, soap, coffee :)
The air hockey in the basement provided hours of fun and being able to park in the garage was a bonus.
We would definitely stay there again!

Scott and Jess were very responsive and answered a bunch of questions for me before even booking. This place is super clean, in a great spot for sunrises (if you’re and early riser), and quiet.
Great place to stay!

This place is EXACTLY what we needed for a large group. The views of the mountains are spectacular! The house is on a quiet street with room to stretch out if you have kids! Our children played 4-Square on the back patio, and there was room for everyone to get away if needed. Highly recommended!
This place was perfect for a family get together. The views of the mountains were amazing and beds were very comfortable. Will definitely stay again next time we come to Casper.
Great place to stay in Casper. Very clean and looks exactly as listed. The hosts were great and super responsive to any questions or needs. Had an amazing time with family at this house.

Scott and Jess were great to work with. Their home worked great for our small family vacation for 3 nights. The home was very clean and has lots of room. We hope to get to come back next year and get to stay there again. Scott and Jess are very responsive host. Thanks again, Deanna D.
This is a great spot, I’m not sure the hosts could add anything to make this a better listing. Be prepared for a comfortable home.

Nice location in Casper. Plenty of space for a couple of families and we had a fun time cooking dinner and playing air hockey while listening to the wind whistle by the mountain.
Beautiful home in a great neighborhood. The views are fantastic. House is perfect for families and has lots of amenities. We will stay here again when visiting Casper.
Wonderful house!! I would recommend it for sure!!

Plenty of room to spread out, games to play, a yard to run in, and while kids are playing, mom can enjoy the soaking tub next to the ginormous walk-in shower in the master bath. There is also a garage to in. Bring slippers as the hardwood floor gets a little cold. I've stayed in numerous air bnbs and this one has been the best. Definitely recommend.
Mercy house is a great home with all the comforts of home!

If we are ever back in the area we would definitely like to stay there again, and bring more of our family with us! Thank you again, Scott and Jess, for a wonderful stay!
